backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining a portfolio backend with a Map store supporting create, addProject, addSkill, and getPortfolio operations keyed by username.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three portfolio features (single-page layout, dark-mode theme, static assets) to their implementing source files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries for each frontend source file, describing their roles in styling, data fetching, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including backgrounds, foregrounds, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the TypeScript module entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that seeds default portfolio data to the backend if none exists, tracks the active scroll section via IntersectionObserver, and composes all page sections.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About Me section component rendering a profile avatar with decorative rings, a bio paragraph, a location badge, and stat cards for experience, projects, and coffee.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section with contact info cards and a controlled form (name, email, message) that simulates async submission and shows a success state on completion.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with a brand section, smooth-scroll navigation links, and social media icon links (GitHub, LinkedIn, X), plus a copyright bar.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Full-screen hero section displaying the developer's name, tagline, CTA buttons that scroll to Projects/About, and social links with animated fade-in effects.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with scroll-aware background blur, active-section highlighting, smooth-scroll links, and a collapsible mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/Projects.tsx: Displays a grid of project cards sourced from backend data, each showing a numbered header, description, GitHub/external links, and skill tags.
frontend/src/components/Skills.tsx: Renders a Skills section with animated progress bars for core competencies from backend data and a static categorized technology tag grid (Frontend, Backend, Tools).
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated via Internet Identity) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating portfolio data (portfolio, skills, projects) via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining a dark-mode amber/gold design system using Tailwind CSS, custom CSS variables in OKLCH, and utility animations like float and fadeInUp.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom OKLCH-based color tokens, amber accent shades, typography/display fonts, and shadow utilities.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing implemented features, and pending feature requests for the portfolio website build, including a pending backend data persistence task (AR-2).
